name: Serino - Royale Maduro XX - Sublime
additionalNotes: Highly regarded by critics and connoisseurs across the globe, The Royale Maduro XX is the original standard created by Anthony Serino. A rich, full-bodied yet perfectly balanced blend that illustrates how every cigar has the opportunity to be a piece of art. Featuring a Ecuador Havana 2000 Oscuro wrapper over a Jalapa Criollo '98 binder with fillers  consisting of Jalapa Criollo '98 Medio Tiempo, Estelí Corojo '99 + Criollo '98. The result is a cigar that deliver notes of cacao, black cherry, leather and pittsburgh rare steak.
